items.sentence: Everyone, no matter how privileged, encounters trials and tribulations.
When his food supply ran short, he had to look for a new place to live.
He is a hard worker, and I'm sure that he will succeed in that new job.
He hadn't been in the office five minutes before he told us what to do.
Had she been a friend of mine, I would have advised her not to do that.
My father spanked me for being a cry baby, which made me cry even more.
You don't have to do anything Tom tells you to do if you don't want to.
This hotel has one indoor swimming pool and two outdoor swimming pools.
She's been practicing piano for a year and can play the piano somewhat.
It would be wise to remember what happened here last year at this time.
